query.value:
SELECT assigned_user_id,
       assigned_user_name,
       branch_id,
       country,
       created_user_id,
       created_user_name,
       date_created,
       date_modified,
       gratitude_points_total,
       holon_number,
       id,
       investment_amount,
       io_sales_stages,
       lead_source,
       level_of_acceptance,
       name,
       next_step,
       next_step_due_date,
       primary_account_id,
       primary_account_name,
       primary_industry,
       probablity_percent,
       project_forecast_year_1,
       project_forecast_year_2,
       project_forecast_year_3,
       project_forecast_year_4,
       project_forecast_year_5,
       region_number,
       reportable_comment_log,
       secondary_industry,
       smc_potential,
       start_of_production,
       sum_of_opportunities,
       sum_of_opportunities_won,
       total_investment_amount,
       total_pneumatic_potential,
       type
FROM NL_BYOD_RLI;
